title: One unified inbox
description: Save movies, places, articles, videos, shopping ideas and more into a single organised app instead of scattering them across different tools.

title: Tags, search and filters
description: Add tags and notes, then use fast search and filters to find what you saved and remember why it mattered.

title: Early-stage, privacy-minded
description: A small, independent product in active development, built with a generous free tier in mind and a clear respect for privacy and GDPR / UK GDPR.
